sentences.sContent: The finance ministers of Norway and Saudi Arabia have no cause to worry about their borrowing costs because they are net creditors.
sentences.sContent_eng: The finance ministers of Norway and Saudi Arabia have no cause to worry about their borrowing costs because they are net creditors.
sentences.sCn: 挪威和沙特阿拉伯的财政大员就没有理由担心他们的借贷成本，因为他们是净债权人。

trans.tranCn: 阿拉伯半岛（亚洲西南部，等于Arabian Peninsula）
